title: Acas early conciliation certificate
p1: You should check the Acas certificate number and date, or whether the claimant was correct to say they were exempt from early conciliation.
link: View Acas certificate (opens in new tab)
label: Do you disagree with any details given by the claimant about early conciliation with Acas?
whyLabel: Why do you disagree with the Acas conciliation details given?
